mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( name, password, subject, content, create_date ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{password}, #{subject}, #{content}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT idx, name, subject, content, view_cnt AS viewCnt, date_format(update_date, '%y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updateDate FROM board WHERE idx = #{idx}
SELECT idx, name, subject, date_format(update_date, '%y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updateDate FROM board ORDER BY update_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, update_date = now() WHERE idx = #{idx}
